attributes.action: Make the old and new pension schemes the same to eliminate the 2nd class status
attributes.background: Create a single state pension scheme by eliminating the old scheme. The administration savings would be beneficial. This petition is to reinstate the one that was cancelled by Parliament.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Increase New State Pension and pay to all, abolish the old Basic State Pension." https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728562
